quotes.quote: If you're on the right side of the issue, just keep driving until you hear glass breaking. Don't quit.
Desire means never quit.
You know you can do more, but everyone expects you to quit.
Rest but never quit. Even the sun has a sinking spell each evening. But it always rises the next morning. At sunrise, every soul is born again.
No matter what's going on in our lives, the victory is in refusing to quit.
If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
The trouble with most people is that they quit before they start.
The real competition is against the little voice inside you that wants to quit.
If you can quit, quit. If you can't quit, stop complaining - this is what you chose.
You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
On tough days, you gotta have heart. Don't quit, whatever you do. Persevere.
No one wants to quit when he's losing and no one wants to quit when he's winning.
Quit while you're ahead. All the best gamblers do.
Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
The man who wins is the man who hangs on just five minutes longer after everyone else has quit.
It's okay to fail; it's not okay to quit.
The temptation to quit will be greatest just before you are about to succeed.
And the best way to quit being concerned with yourself is to be concerned about others.
You can always quit, so why quit now.
People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed becacuse they are determined to.
Losers quit when they're tired. Winners quit when they've won.
People quit people before they quit companies.
Great men are just ordinary men that didn't quit.
We'll succeed unless we quit.
Winners are not those who never fail, but those who never quit.
It's human nature to quit when it hurts. But it's that reflex that creates scarcity.
Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
The only way to fail is to quit.
Before you quit, you have to try.
If you never quit, you're never beaten.
